FuncDef:
The scheduling-mode command configures a scheduling mode.
The undo scheduling-mode command cancels the scheduling mode. The scheduling-mode command configures a scheduling mode. The undo scheduling-mode command cancels the scheduling mode. By default, no scheduling mode is configured. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.
